pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Vegetation Databases and Treat Taxonomy // Handling of vegetation data from different sources ( Turboveg http://www.synbiosys.alterra.nl/turboveg/; the German national repository http://www.vegetweb.de and others. Taxonomic harmonization (given appropriate taxonomic lists, e.g. the German taxonomic standard list "GermanSL", http://germansl.infinitenature.org).
